Html:
Hi,

I'm trying to use QuickGraph 3.3's .NET 2.0 release to create Graphviz dot files. I have a slight problem with the definition of GraphvizAlgorithm class' FormatEdge event. In the document and source code (Change Set 36262), the event is defined using delegate FormatEdgeEventHandler<TVertex,TEdge>, however I couldn't use this in my project, I have to use FormatEdgeAction instead of FormatEdgeEventHandler to make it work. This worries me a bit since I'm not sure if I'm using the correct dll and source code, the dll version is strange as well, it's 3.2.40610.0, even though the download page says it's 3.3.40824.00, any ideas?

Thanks
